author: Mark Knapp
title: Laptops vs Desktops: Which computer is better when you work from home
description: If you’re working from home, you may struggle to choose between using a desktop or laptop. We’ve got the key details you should consider.
content:
People all have different impressions of what it actually means to work from home
. Some think its all just lounging in bed, binging TV shows, doing chores around the house, and watching the work fall by the wayside. That can certainly be what some days of w… [+7021 chars]
